mapper.select:
select b.no b_no, b.title, b.content, b.member_no, b.write_date, b.state b_state, m.no m_no, m.email, m.password, m.nickname, m.birthday, m.last_login, m.join_date, m.state m_state from board b join (select no from board
title like concat('%',#{title},'%') and
content like concat('%',#{content},'%') and
(substr(write_date,1,10) between #{startDate} and #{endDate}) and
limit #{start}, #{length}) i on b.no=i.no left join (select * from member
where nickname like concat('%',#{nickname},'%')
) m on b.member_no=m.no order by b.no desc
mapper.insert: insert into board(title, content, member_no, write_date, state) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{memberNo}, now(), 1)
